title: Texas Hold'Em Poker App
description: Developed a multi-threaded Poker App in C++ with a Qt-based interface. Includes features such as custom game parameters, suggested actions, AI-driven opponents, and more!

title: Ultimate Trivia Challenge
description: JavaScript trivia game served through Node.js server. Four different categories to choose from and leaderboard for top scores!

title: Custom Small Shell
description: A custom shell implementation in C that supports Linux commands, background processes, signal handling, input/output redirection, and a foreground-only mode toggle.

title: One-Time Pad Encryption
description: A server-client program in C for one-time pad encryption and decryption, featuring key generation, secure communication, and error handling mechanisms.

title: Multi-Threaded Pipeline
description: Multi-threaded consumer-producer pipeline in C that processes data through a series of stages, each with its own thread.
